channel.title: Fixed please lock! thank you all who posted!

item.title: Fixed please lock! thank you all who posted!
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“pure ess ftw, post:2, topic:275194”][quote author=pk3r john link=topic=363558.msg2761073#msg2761073 date=1240530559]
Yes I DO HAVE A CLIENT.

Whenever I wield my silverlight and try to attack something my character always punches.
Why is this?
It’s in my item.cfg…
[/quote]
switch the gfx which it attacks[/quote]

THANKS!
I also had a problem with the bonuses but fixed

Read full topic
item.source: Fixed please lock! thank you all who posted!
